mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECALL_BOARD ( BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_NAME, BOARD_DATE, HIT ) VALUES ( RECALL_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardName}, SYSDATE, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RECALL_BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO AS boardNo, BOARD_TITLE AS boardTitle, BOARD_CONTENT AS boardContent, BOARD_NAME AS boardName, BOARD_DATE AS boardDate, HIT AS boardHit FROM RECALL_BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE RECALL_BOARD SET HIT = HIT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
